name: Ona-Ken! International
detailed_description:
The very popular Japanese version of "Ona Ken!" arrives in English!

・Introduction
This game was released in Japan before, it is one of the topics of the game.
This game is a game of sexy content, but there are differences from other games.

When it says something, the character of this game sometimes exposes "female masturbation"
that women do not usually talk to sometimes brightly and openly, sometimes to whimsy.

Although the story of this game is fiction, perhaps it may be possible to know the sexual life of a woman that men did not know with this game.

If you are interested in this content please try playing this game!


・Story
Nao Kasukabe is a famous troublemaker in school. Right now her "boom" is whopping masturbation!
She'll start a new club involving her childhood friend Hibiki, her classmate Norika, even Mako the upperclassman. Its name is "Ona-Ken!"
The club activities will be forced conversation while masturbating with pink-cheeked shame.
Norika and Mako talk explicitly about how they're touching themselves,
and Nao demonstrates the variety of masturbation methods of women using her own body.

Ona-Ken! is the pursuit of great masturbation. What heights will eager loins reach when they belong to girls who never get tired of jilling off?

・Features
Sexy content visual game.

It is cute and fun to include the genre "Yuri". Still a sexy story line.

Various choices that affect game ending and multiple story routes.

Convenient functions for playing games such as multiple save slots.

short_description: This game contains many female nudity and sexual expressions. Please do not absolutely play games for people of low age. When playing this game, be sure that there are no people of low age around. This game was created in Japan-party applications, you need to install the Japanese package of Windows.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WindowsXP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Pentium4 2.0G or more
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game was created in Japan-party applications, you need to install the Japanese package of Windows.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Pentium4 2.0G or more
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game was created in Japan-party applications, you need to install the Japanese package of Windows.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game includes depictions of sex acts.
It also includes depictions that seem to be sex with homosexuality.

However, it is not a game of homosexuality theme.
